title: Are You Fleeing or Staying (Rick Ross Interview)
itunes:title: Are You Fleeing or Staying (Rick Ross Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had Rick Ross stop by where he spoke about investing, new car show, and why he walked off 85 South Interview. Later on they open up the phone lines to see if our listeners would stay or run away if they were with their partner while he was getting robbed, after a story came out about a woman leaving her husband behind while he got robbed. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a California man who was arrested and charged with making threats against Merriam-Webster Inc. for use of gender-inclusive definitions

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
